house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1952 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) . Rooms include master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace, storage space.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Fine Properties RE/MAX Fine Properties
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen,Storage Space, Wet Bar
